column10: Content dependent Content Dependent (System) refers to a system which attempts to detect the dominant type of files in that folder and then select the most appropriate view mode for you automatically.

column13: yes (show tab-bar optional) Tab-bar mode can be activated to show the tab-bar (else it will be hidden).

column7: yesOptional image thumbnailer plugin since v0.3.4 (24/5/2007)

column3: Text The text interface, which can be partially graphical with some plugins, such as embedded image/video viewers, for example. But the text interface is only emulated with the ConEmu mod - it is graphical and TrueColor in reality.
column4: partialWith the ConEmu mod or plugins
column7: yesWith ConEmu Far Manager plugin conemu-maximus5
